revision.text: Possibly: The Scripture-Doctrine of the Trinity. Wherein Every Text in the New Testament relating to that Doctrine, is distinctly considered; and the Divinity of our Blessed Saviour according to the Scriptures, proved and explained. By Samuel Clarke, D.D. Rector of St. James's Westminster. (London : Printed by W. Wilkins, for James Knapton, at the Crown in St. Paul's Church-Yard, 1719.) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2409308~S1
